comment:
* This class contains information about how a runtime permission
 * is used. A single runtime permission presented to the user may
 * correspond to multiple platform defined permissions, e.g. the
 * location permission may control both the coarse and fine platform
 * permissions.
 *
 * @hide

methods.name: public int getAppAccessCount()
methods.comment: * @return The number of apps that accessed this permission

methods.name: public String getName()
methods.comment:
* Gets the permission group name.
     *
     * @return The name.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(Parcel parcel, int flags)

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(Parcel parcel, int flags)
